1: bcom ldan <mistake>'das 'dod</mistake> chags che//'dod chags kun la rjes chags <mistake>phyir //rdo</mistake> rje sems dpa' de nyid <mistake>kyang//sn</mistake> tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i <mistake>'od//del</mistake> ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin
2: <mistake>zhen/thod</mistake> phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan <mistake>i/khams</mistake> gsum la ni dbu rgyan <mistake>med //thod</mistake> pa'i phreng <mistake>b'dbu</mistake> rgyan ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag <mistake>sngon</mistake> bskyed//khams gsum las ni rin <mistake>chan</mistake> <mistake>gzhan/</mistake>
3: sangs rgyas rin <mistake>chan</mistake> 'dra ba <mistake>med/sangs</mistake> rgyas thams cad rin chen ces//dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin//de nas <mistake>j</mistake> ltar <mistake>sams</mistake> dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe <mistake>na/ yan</mistake> lag g.yas pas <mistake>mnyam//</mistake>
4: gnon pas//g.yon pa'i yan lag <mistake>gzar</mistake> nas su//de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can//rdo rje <mistake>nying</mistake> po <mistake>gtsobo'i</mistake> gtso//de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i <mistake>lta</mistake> mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid
5: kyi shes pa yin zhe na/kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na//dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i <mistake>mchog /kun</mistake> mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas//thams <mistake>cang</mistake> <mistake>dbang phyug</mistake> che ru 'phags//grub
6: rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs//dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo <mistake>bdag /rdo</mistake> rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin//de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7: kyi gsang <mistake>b</mistake> chen po'i de nyid lnga yin <mistake>zhena/me</mistake> long khrag <mistake>thung</mistake> zhes bya rnams//mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang <mistake>mchog /so</mistake> sor rtog la nyi ma <mistake>ste/ byab</mistake> la <mistake>n</mistake> rta mchog <mistake>dang//chos</mistake> kyi <mistake>dbyangs</mistake> la sangs
8: rgyas ni//thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid <mistake>'i//'dod</mistake> chags chen po bde ba che//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin <mistake>drig//ro</mistake> dang reg <mistake>byade</mistake> bzhin yang //rdo rje sems
